content: angry rainbow uterus materials uterus worsted weight with red 6sc in magic_ring 6 yarn in red increase 2sc in each stitch around 12 orange yellow single_crochet increase around 18 switching to orange in last stitch green blue with orange 2sc increase around 24 purple white and 3sc increase around 30 black single_crochet around switching to yellow in last stitch 30 size d hook with yellow single_crochet around for three row 30 switching to green yarn needle in last stitch fiberfill with green single_crochet around 30 9mm safety eyes optional 8sc decrease single_crochet two together around 27 7sc decrease around 24 switching to blue in last stitch directions with blue 6sc decrease around 21 uterus is crocheted in the round at the end of each round do not 5sc decrease around 18 pause here to insert safety eyes use a slip_stitch but continue stitching onto the next available stitch use a small amount of black thread to embroider angry if you d like you can use a stitch marker to hold your place eyebrows and a frowning face stuff the uterus ovaries make 2 single_crochet decrease around 12 switching to purple in last stitch with white 6sc in magic_ring 6 with purple single_crochet around for three row 12 finish stuffing increase 2sc in each stitch around 12 using back loops only blo decrease around 6 and finish single_crochet around 12 stuff lightly off decrease single_crochet two together around 6 finish off leaving a tail attach fallopian tubes with smaller end on either side of the for sewing top and the ovary end near the center of the uterus see picture for placement fallopian tubes make 2 with red 6sc in magic_ring 6 single_crochet around for approximately 12 row 6 increase 3sc in same stitch three times 15 finish off sew one ovary to the open side of the tube copyright 2022 jenni frencham you may sell items you make with this pattern you may not sell this pattern on your own site leave this copyright information in place
